thread.title: SEC to Advance Efforts to Streamline Disclosure Requirements in 2018

author: Tatyana Shumsky
title: SEC to Advance Efforts to Streamline Disclosure Requirements in 2018
text:
Companies can expect the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission’s corporation finance division to implement incremental changes aimed at easing securities registration and disclosure requirements in the year ahead.
Corporation Finance Division Director William Hinman and his team, speaking Friday on a panel at the Practising Law Institute’s “SEC Speaks” Conference in Washington, D.C., outlined a near-term plan that rests on previously announced initiatives.
